name: Algorithmics UK
slogan: Algorithmics UK is an educational, technology-driven company, teaching children to code
description:
Programming is a skill of the 21st century. Even though many schools teach information and communication technology, lots of students still have minimal elementary programming skills.
Algorithmics combines offline and online learning in programming classes for children from 8 to 15 years old. Our team consists of professionals who love children and want to make programming simple, exciting and fun for them. At Algorithmics, we help children take their first steps in STEM. Our students create video games, cartoons and IT projects. They acquire skills in critical thinking and logical reasoning, presentation and project planning, teamwork and more. No matter who they grow up to be, these children will take advantage of what they learn with us.

jobs.title: Head of Sales
jobs.descriptionHtml:
What You Will Work On
• Building Algorithmics sales engine: creating sales funnel with key touch points, management process, sales scripts, CRM platform integration
• Building from the scratch and managing a team of sales managers
• Planning and delivering against sales KPIs
• Hands on approach to driving sales and establishing the key drivers and ways to overcome barriers – you will need to be ready to roll the sleeves in the initial start-up stage
• Engaging and consulting new and existing customer base
• Contributing to product and pricing strategy

Apply, if You Are
• An experienced sales manager in a b2c services sector with a proven track record;
• An experienced and effective people manager;
• Experienced in creating effective sales processes and in using CRM systems to manage them;
• Of a start-up mentality and driven by an opportunity to build a successful educational technology-driven business from scratch;
• Result-oriented negotiator and good in closing deals;
• Creative at connecting with people;
• Comfortable with any modes of communication, be it phone, email, messengers, social media;
• Organised and self-motivated;
• Experience in educational sector is a plus

What You Will Get
• Great earning opportunities based on competitive fixed salary and pay-for-performance bonus scheme
• Experience in working at the fast-growing educational technology start-up
• Opportunity to work remotely
• Support from co-founders and opportunity to work with senior business experts in education, management consulting, IT and marketing
